text:
Biden, Gaga bat for a cause

Joe Biden, U.S. Vice President, and singer Lady Gaga took to the stage to urge artistes and viewers to fight against sexual assault. Biden introduced Gaga to sing her nominated song ‘Til it happens to you’ from the documentary The Hunting Ground , and asked the viewers to sign on to the pledge at the “It’s On Us” website to stop sexual assault. Gaga poured her heart out as she struck an emotional chord with the audience. As her performance at the Oscars neared its end, a group of men and women joined her on stage with messages like “not your fault” and “survivor” written on their arms. — IANS
title: Joe Biden, Lady Gaga get on Oscars stage for a cause
